name: 2dcat
author: AFNI Team
description: Puts a set of images into an image matrix montage of NX by NY images.

inputs.description: List of input image files.
inputs.name: Input Files

inputs.description: Multiply each image in the output image matrix by the color or intensity of the pixel in the scale image.
inputs.name: Scale Image

inputs.description: Multiply each pixel in the output image by the color or intensity of the pixel in the scale image. The scale image is resized to the output image's resolution.
inputs.name: Scale Pixels

inputs.description: Use the intensity (average color) of the pixel instead of its color.
inputs.name: Scale Intensity

inputs.description: Apply additional scaling factor.
inputs.name: Global Scale Factor

inputs.description: Force output to be in RGB, even if input is bytes.
inputs.name: RGB Out

inputs.description: Set resolution of all input images.
inputs.name: Input Resolution

inputs.description: Resample to max while respecting the aspect ratio, then pad to desired pixel count.
inputs.name: Resample and Pad Input

inputs.description: Set the padding value when using -respad_in. Should be in the range [0, 255], default is 0.
inputs.name: Padding Value

inputs.description: Crop images by specified number of pixels from the left, right, top, and bottom.
inputs.name: Crop Pixels

inputs.description: Automatically crop lines where RGB values differ by less than the specified percentage from the corner pixel values.
inputs.name: Auto Crop Corner Tolerance

inputs.description: Automatically crop lines where RGB values differ by less than the specified percentage from the line average.
inputs.name: Auto Crop Average Tolerance

inputs.description: Automatically crop lines with default tolerances using both autocrop_atol and autocrop_ctol set to 20.
inputs.name: Auto Crop

inputs.description: Use solid black images if not enough images are provided to fill the matrix.
inputs.name: Zero Wrap

inputs.description: Use solid white images if not enough images are provided to fill the matrix.
inputs.name: White Wrap

inputs.description: Use solid gray images if not enough images are provided to fill the matrix. The gray value must be between 0 and 1.0.
inputs.name: Gray Wrap

inputs.description: Reuse images to fill the matrix. This is the default behavior.
inputs.name: Image Wrap

inputs.description: Randomize the order of images when reusing to fill the matrix.
inputs.name: Random Wrap

inputs.description: Prefix the output file names with the specified string.
inputs.name: Output Prefix

inputs.description: Specify the number of images in each row (NX) and column (NY) of the image matrix.
inputs.name: Matrix Dimensions

inputs.description: Specify the number of images in each row.
inputs.name: Number of Images in Each Row

inputs.description: Specify the number of images in each column.
inputs.name: Number of Images in Each Column

inputs.description: Set matrix dimensions NX and NY to be the same as the SCALE_IMG's dimensions. Requires the -scale_image option.
inputs.name: Matrix from Scale

inputs.description: Put a gap of specified pixels between images.
inputs.name: Gap Size

inputs.description: Set color of the gap line to specified R, G, B values. Values range from 0 to 255.
inputs.name: Gap Color

output-files.description: The main output image matrix file.
output-files.name: Output Image

output-files.description: A 1D file containing the average of RGB values, if the prefix ends with .1D.
output-files.name: Output 1D File
